context.p: To synchronize your Eucalyptus component machines with an NTP server, perform the following tasks.

step.cmd: Enter the following command on a machine hosting a Eucalyptus component:

info.codeblock: # ntpdate pool.ntp.org # service ntpd start # chkconfig ntpd on # ps ax | grep ntp # hwclock --systohc

step.cmd: Repeat for each machine hosting a Eucalyptus component.
